pre_caption: This is a very dark, nighttime scenery shot of a quiet street. The red taillights of a car are visible on the left as it drives away. The road ahead is dimly illuminated, showing the faint outline of another car and some trees.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a very dark, nighttime scenery shot of a quiet street. The red taillights of a car are visible on the left as it drives away. The road ahead is dimly illuminated, showing the faint outline of another car and some trees.

Initially, the faint outline of a car and some trees are visible on the right side of the frame, with the road ahead dimly illuminated. These two sections of the dimly lit road are separated by an area of darkness, where only a tiny, faint red light is visible in the latter part of the video.
